<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/portal/payment/customer/operationsreport"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Starts generating a customer operations report as an "xlsx" file and saves it in Documents.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"startDate":{"type":"string","description":"The report start date.","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"},"endDate":{"type":"string","description":"The report end date.","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"},"participantName":{"type":"string","description":"The participant name.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"credit":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to include credit operations in the report.","nullable":true,"example":true},"debit":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to include debit operations in the report.","nullable":true,"example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for generating a report on client operations.","title":"CustomerOperationsReportRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
